Plan: 1 to add, 1 to drop.

Summary by type:
  tables: 1 to add
  privileges: 1 to drop

Tables:
  + readonly_data

Privileges:
  - app_user

DDL to be executed:
--------------------------------------------------

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS readonly_data (
    id integer,
    value text,
    CONSTRAINT readonly_data_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

REVOKE DELETE, INSERT, UPDATE ON TABLE readonly_data FROM app_user;
